Besides filling the log the progress view pops to front informing me about 
this error. This is really annoying.

This exception has been fixed in HEAD. The progress view behavior is provided 
by UI. You should log a separate bug report against Platform UI for that 
problem.
*** Bug 43894 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
